title: Classroom cleaning; exception
context: §89-23 Classroom cleaning; exception. No collective bargaining agreement or executive policy put forth after July 1, 1993, shall contain provisions that may preclude the implementation of the classroom cleaning project established in section 302A-1507, unless a contract waiver process exists between the parties. [L 1993, c 364, §21; am L 1996, c 89, §7]
